Reference

All functions

brca.data

TCGA Breast Cancer Data

checkNegCtrlGenes()

Check Unwanted variation in Negative Control Genes

computeANOVA()

Anova test for batch effect on individual gene expressions

computeCorr()

Gene Correlation analysis

computePCA()

Generate PCA

createPRPS()

Generate PRPS for RUV-III

filterGenesByBiotypes()

Gene Filter

filterLowExprGenes()

Low Count Genes Filter

filterSamplesByLibSize()

Filter Samples based on Library Size

filterSamplesByPurity()

Filter Samples based on Tumor Purity

plotLibSize()

Library Size

plotPC()

PCA Visualization

plotPCsVar()

Regression Analysis between PCs and unwanted variation

plotPRPS()

RUV-III PRPS Map

plotStudyOutline()

Study Design Plot

runRUV_III_PRPS()

Generate RUV-III Data Object
